spinifex 0.3.4

Theme spinifex

Source: R/0_util.r
theme_spinifex.Rd

A ggplot2 theme suggested for linear projections with spinifex. The default theme in spinifex functions.

theme_spinifex(...)

Arguments

...

Optionally pass arguments to ggplot2::theme().

See also

ggplot2::theme for all theme options.

Examples

theme_spinifex()
#> [[1]]
#> List of 93
#>  $ line                      :List of 6
#>   ..$ colour       : chr "black"
#>   ..$ size         : num 0.5
#>   ..$ linetype     : num 1
#>   ..$ lineend      : chr "butt"

require("ggplot2")
ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg, color = as.factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point() + theme_spinifex()
